name: 3AM At the Shack
description:
Welcome to The Shack.
An experience to never be forgotten, death is around every corner. Can you survive?
Forgotten Toys and possessed dogs are hiding away and wanting to kill you, taking every chance they have got... 

CONTROLS
A= Scare Possessed Dog
F AND C = Toggle Flashlight 
M = Turn on music, scare Scruff
Arrow Keys= Look around

FEEDBACK
Please consider giving me feedback to improve 3AM at The Shack.
